document_data.name: Bann Alagondar
document_data.mainbody: '''Bann Alagondar''' was a member of the [[Alagondar]] royal family and the king of Neverwinter in the late years of the 14th century DR.
document_data.Relationships: Bann was the son of [[Nasher Alagondar]]. He had a younger half-brother, [[Vers Never]].
document_data.History: After the death of Nasher Alagondar, Bann succeeded his father as the second king of Neverwinter. He founded the Alagondar royal family.
